vialab.SMT.util

Class ZonePicker

  • java.lang.Object
    • vialab.SMT.util.ZonePicker

  • public class ZonePicker
extends java.lang.Object
    A little utility class for mapping the pixel coordinates of touches to zones.

        public processing.opengl.PGraphics3D picking_context

    • Constructor Detail

      • ZonePicker

        public ZonePicker()
        Create a new zone picker. SMT.init() must have been called first.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(Zone zone)
        Add a zone to the zone picker.
        Parameters:
        zone - the zone to enable picking on.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Zone zone)
        Check whether this zone picker has already registered a zone
        Parameters:
        zone - a zone
        Returns:
        whether the specified zone has already been added to the zone picker

      • remove

        public Zone remove(Zone zone)
        Remove the specified zone from the zone picker
        Parameters:
        zone - the zone to remove
        Returns:
        The zone that was removed

      • pick

        public Zone pick(int x,
                 int y)
        Get the Zone under the specified coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the specified pixel
        y - y coordinate of the specified pixel
        Returns:
        If there is a Zone at the specified coordinates, that zone, otherwise null.

      • render

        public void render()
        Prepare the picking graphics context for picking
